HPI 8224 Lancia Delta Evo 1993 1,000 Lakes Rally 4th Place T. Mäkinen/S. Harjanne



Tommi Mäkinen and Seppo Harjanne contested 3 rounds of the 1993 WRC season for the Astra Racing team out of Italy. One of those rounds was his “home” event, the 1,000 Lakes Rally. This was the 7th time he competed in the event and it was his best finish yet. Mäkinen won three special stages and finished the rally in the same position as he started - in 4th place.
